an10.19:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pancangavippahino hoti, chalangasamannagato, ekarakkho, caturapasseno, panunnapaccekasacco, samavayasatthesano, anavilasankappo, passaddhakayasankharo, suvimuttacitto, suvimuttapanno.
